personal.name: Muhammad Zulfikri
personal.title: Frontend Developer
personal.subtitle: UI/UX Enthusiast
personal.bio: With over 7 years in the tech industry, I've evolved from a fullstack developer into a frontend specialist who truly loves crafting user interfaces that just feel right. My journey has taken me through diverse projects at companies like Nawatech, Jejakin, and PT Solman Manunggal Informatika, where I've learned that great frontend development isn't just about making things look good‚Äîit's about creating experiences that users actually enjoy using.

items.title: Maindealers
items.description: An enterprise-grade motorcycle sales ecosystem with multi-channel chatbot integration (WhatsApp + embeddable web widgets). Features white-label solutions for dealer partners, campaign-driven QR code generation, and seamless data injection capabilities across three interconnected applications designed to scale customer acquisition.
highlights: Web Console (React) - Campaign management with QR code generation for customer acquisition
Multi-channel Chatbot - Qiscus integration for WhatsApp + embeddable web widget for dealer websites
Product Catalog (Next.js) - Interactive motorcycle showcase with installment simulation
White-label solution: Embeddable chatbot with custom data injection for dealer partners
Integrated customer journey: QR scan ‚Üí Chatbot ‚Üí Catalog ‚Üí Lead capture
Cross-application data flow for seamless user experience and prospect tracking

items.title: Nawatech Internal Management System
items.description: A comprehensive enterprise-grade internal management platform built for Nawatech to centralize all company operations. Features Azure AD SSO integration for seamless employee authentication and supports advanced project management with MPP file uploads for Microsoft Project integration.
highlights: Azure AD SSO integration for seamless company-wide authentication
Project Management with MPP file upload support for Microsoft Project
Task Management system with assignment and tracking capabilities
Leave Management with approval workflows and calendar integration
Employee Management with role-based access control
Timesheet tracking with project allocation and reporting

items.description: Leading frontend development initiatives with a focus on modern React applications and user experience optimization. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable web solutions that serve thousands of users daily.

Developed responsive web applications using React and modern frontend technologies. Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces while maintaining excellent performance and accessibility standards.
Enhanced existing applications and built new features using various programming languages and frameworks. Mentored junior developers and contributed to technical decision-making processes.

Started my professional journey developing both frontend and backend solutions. Built web applications from concept to deployment, gaining valuable experience in the complete software development lifecycle.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and interesting projects.
